data.eml:eml: New and little-known species of Arachnospila (subgenus Ammosphex) (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae) from East Siberia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Loktionov, Valery M., Lelej, Arkady S. (2015): New and little-known species of Arachnospila (subgenus Ammosphex) (Hymenoptera: Pompilidae) from East Siberia. Zootaxa 3911 (2): 218-230, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3911.2.4
